_description: Skyy mascot character pose template. Used by generate-skyy-poses.js.
header: 3D CGI ANIMATED CHARACTER IMAGE — PIXAR QUALITY
referenceInstruction: FIRST IMAGE = CHARACTER REFERENCE (Skyy). REMAINING IMAGES = PRODUCT REFERENCE (garment to replicate).

artStyle.style: 3D CGI animated. Pixar / Disney movie quality.
artStyle.instruction: MATCH THE ART STYLE OF THE FIRST REFERENCE IMAGE EXACTLY.

character.name: Skyy
character.block: CHARACTER IDENTITY — MATCH THE REFERENCE IMAGE EXACTLY
character.ageAppearance: Young girl character, approximately 8-10 years old appearance
character.build: Petite, compact, childlike proportions — shorter stature, round cute body shape. NOT an adult — NOT tall fashion-model proportions.
character.hair: Large, voluminous, fluffy natural afro. Pure dark brown/black color ONLY — no red tint, no colored glow. Big, round, cloud-like. Soft curly texture — individual curls visible within the puff. Hair color must remain true dark brown/black.
character.skin: Warm medium-brown complexion. Smooth, even 3D CGI skin tone (not photorealistic texture).
character.face: Large, wide-set expressive eyes with long lashes. Small round nose. Warm friendly smile. Round chubby cheeks. Childlike, sweet, approachable.
character.expression: Friendly, warm, confident — the little ambassador of the brand
criticalRules: Art style MUST be 3D CGI animated — Pixar/Disney quality
Large natural afro is non-negotiable — this is her defining feature
Young girl proportions — petite and cute, NOT adult model
Match the reference character image attached as the first image

idle.label: Presenting — arms slightly open, welcoming pose
idle.description: Standing tall facing forward, arms slightly extended at sides in a welcoming open gesture — like she's presenting the collection. Weight slightly on one hip. Confident, warm, editorial. Full body visible from head to toe.
idle.cameraAngle: Full body shot, slight low angle (3/4 height), head at upper third

point.label: Pointing — hand extended toward product/collection
point.description: One arm extended forward pointing toward camera-left, fingers elegant and deliberate. Other hand resting on hip. Engaging gaze. Body turned 3/4 toward camera. Full body visible.
point.cameraAngle: Full body 3/4 angle, head and pointing hand in upper quadrant

walk.label: Walking — confident runway stride
walk.description: Mid-stride walking pose — one leg forward, slight arm swing, head high, shoulder back. Runway walk energy. The garment moves naturally with the stride. Full body from head to foot.
walk.cameraAngle: Full body slight diagonal, mid-stride captured at peak motion

clothingRules: IDENTICAL reproduction of every graphic, text, logo, color, hardware detail
If the garment has text — the EXACT same text, same font style, same placement
No artistic simplification — reproduce EVERY detail from the product reference images

background.style: Clean studio background appropriate to the collection
background.instruction: Transparent or solid color — character must be the focus. NO busy backgrounds unless specified in product override.

criticalRules: Character identity = Skyy from reference. Non-negotiable.
